job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you a software consultant who has relied on LLMs to make life easier for most of your career? Are you afraid your hard skills will atrophy if you continue spending most of your day on low-skill tasks? Jigsaw is revolutionizing consulting by harnessing the power of AI to cut through the noise and let you focus on what truly matters: delivering high-impact results for clients. If you're driven by innovation and want to be at the forefront of AI-enhanced project delivery, this role is tailor-made for you.

   Jigsaw is fundamentally rethinking how projects are delivered, using generative AI to automate the mundane and elevate the strategic. Say goodbye to the grind of manual configuration, which you are overqualified to do anyway, and hello to a world where AI does the heavy lifting, freeing you to focus on building systems and delivering unparalleled client service.

   This isn't your average consulting gig. If you're looking to spend your days entrenched in manual tasks, this isn't the job for you. Instead, we need someone who thrives on using AI to push boundaries, someone who relishes the challenge of aligning technology with client business goals. You'll be advising on everything from survey design to panel creation, all while ensuring that the solutions you deliver are flawlessly aligned with client expectations.

   Join us if you're excited by the idea of transforming the consulting landscape, if you want to leave behind the old ways and embrace a role where your strategic input has real, measurable impact. This is your chance to be part of a team that's not just keeping up with the future of consulting but defining it. If that sounds like you, we want to hear from you.

   What you will be doing

     * AI-Enhanced Project Delivery: Using generative AI to improve project delivery, customer communications, and validation of project deliverables.
     * Consulting Services: Gathering and analyzing customer business requirements, advising on survey structure, best practices for panel creation, and training clients on the software platform.
     * Configuration Services: Configuring surveys, panels, and data gathering processes within the software platform.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Manually reviewing every knowledge base article and Excel trackers
     * Creating slide decks
     * Traveling to client sites
     * Coding or programming
job_details.full_text:
Implementation Engineer, Jigsaw (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

Are you a software consultant who has relied on LLMs to make life easier for most of your career? Are you afraid your hard skills will atrophy if you continue spending most of your day on low-skill tasks? Jigsaw is revolutionizing consulting by harnessing the power of AI to cut through the noise and let you focus on what truly matters: delivering high-impact results for clients. If you're driven by innovation and want to be at the forefront of AI-enhanced project delivery, this role is tailor-made for you.

   Jigsaw is fundamentally rethinking how projects are delivered, using generative AI to automate the mundane and elevate the strategic. Say goodbye to the grind of manual configuration, which you are overqualified to do anyway, and hello to a world where AI does the heavy lifting, freeing you to focus on building systems and delivering unparalleled client service.

   This isn't your average consulting gig. If you're looking to spend your days entrenched in manual tasks, this isn't the job for you. Instead, we need someone who thrives on using AI to push boundaries, someone who relishes the challenge of aligning technology with client business goals. You'll be advising on everything from survey design to panel creation, all while ensuring that the solutions you deliver are flawlessly aligned with client expectations.

   Join us if you're excited by the idea of transforming the consulting landscape, if you want to leave behind the old ways and embrace a role where your strategic input has real, measurable impact. This is your chance to be part of a team that's not just keeping up with the future of consulting but defining it. If that sounds like you, we want to hear from you.

   What you will be doing

     * AI-Enhanced Project Delivery: Using generative AI to improve project delivery, customer communications, and validation of project deliverables.
     * Consulting Services: Gathering and analyzing customer business requirements, advising on survey structure, best practices for panel creation, and training clients on the software platform.
     * Configuration Services: Configuring surveys, panels, and data gathering processes within the software platform.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Manually reviewing every knowledge base article and Excel trackers
     * Creating slide decks
     * Traveling to client sites
     * Coding or programming

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on the application of AI tools to enhance productivity within a consulting context, rather than the development or deep technical implementation of AI models. It explicitly states 'Coding or programming' is not part of the role, which contradicts core responsibilities of ML or GenAI Engineers.

job_tasks.phrase: harnessing the power of AI to cut through the noise and let you focus on what truly matters: delivering high-impact results for clients.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the use of AI to achieve business objectives (delivering high-impact results for clients) and implies understanding client needs.

job_tasks.phrase: Jigsaw is fundamentally rethinking how projects are delivered, using generative AI to automate the mundane and elevate the strategic.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a focus on business process improvement and strategic application of AI within a consulting framework.

job_tasks.phrase: freeing you to focus on building systems and delivering unparalleled client service.
job_tasks.justification: Emphasizes client service and delivering value, which are business-oriented goals.

job_tasks.phrase: thrives on using AI to push boundaries, someone who relishes the challenge of aligning technology with client business goals.
job_tasks.justification: Directly links AI application to client business goals and strategic alignment.

job_tasks.phrase: advising on everything from survey design to panel creation, all while ensuring that the solutions you deliver are flawlessly aligned with client expectations.
job_tasks.justification: This describes consulting activities focused on client needs and delivering solutions that meet expectations.

job_tasks.phrase: transforming the consulting landscape, if you want to leave behind the old ways and embrace a role where your strategic input has real, measurable impact.
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on strategic impact and transforming a business domain (consulting).

job_tasks.phrase: AI-Enhanced Project Delivery: Using generative AI to improve project delivery, customer communications, and validation of project deliverables.
job_tasks.justification: Describes the application of AI to improve business processes (project delivery, communications, validation) and achieve business outcomes.

job_tasks.phrase: Consulting Services: Gathering and analyzing customer business requirements, advising on survey structure, best practices for panel creation, and training clients on the software platform.
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct description of consulting activities, focusing on understanding client needs and providing advice.

job_tasks.phrase: Configuration Services: Configuring surveys, panels, and data gathering processes within the software platform.
job_tasks.justification: While this involves using a platform, the context is service delivery and configuration for clients, aligning with business needs rather than core technical development.
Explicitly states this is NOT a responsibility, ruling out traditional software development as a core task.

technologies.justification: Mentioned as a core technology used to enhance consulting services.
Identified as the primary technology driving the role's innovation and automation.

soft_skills.phrase: relied on LLMs to make life easier for most of your career?
soft_skills.justification: Implies a history of adapting to and utilizing new technologies (LLMs) for efficiency.
Indicates a proactive and forward-thinking mindset.

soft_skills.phrase: focus on what truly matters: delivering high-impact results for clients.
soft_skills.justification: Suggests a pragmatic, results-oriented approach to client work.
Demonstrates initiative and a desire to innovate within the consulting process.
Highlights a focus on higher-level thinking and problem-solving rather than mundane tasks.

soft_skills.phrase: thrives on using AI to push boundaries
soft_skills.justification: Indicates a proactive and innovative approach to leveraging technology.

soft_skills.phrase: relishes the challenge of aligning technology with client business goals.
soft_skills.justification: Shows a strong aptitude for problem-solving and strategic thinking in a business context.

soft_skills.phrase: strategic input has real, measurable impact.
soft_skills.justification: Suggests a desire for ownership and to drive significant outcomes.

soft_skills.phrase: Gathering and analyzing customer business requirements
soft_skills.justification: Requires understanding and communicating client needs effectively.

soft_skills.phrase: advising on survey structure, best practices for panel creation
soft_skills.justification: Involves communicating expertise and guiding clients.

soft_skills.phrase: training clients on the software platform.
soft_skills.justification: Requires clear communication and teaching skills.
